about_the_game:
※English translations and BGM have been added!

This is a demo version of a completely original, full-color visual novel.
More than 400 stills for the demo version (more than 700 for the full version).
※This work contains very extreme and grotesque language. There is no sexual content.

Total play time is expected to be 5 hours (the production version is about 8 hours).
The background music is a sophisticated piece of music written by several excellent Japanese composers.
From the first time you play, the game has a "Start from any chapter" mode.

In the trial version, you can play the scenario from the prologue to chapter 10.


Story.
　2020, Japan. Boring everyday. Uninspired days. The world is still as rotten as ever.

　I wish that everything would break down anyway.

　Even if I thought about that, I guess life would go on unchanged.
